name: Hackthon.ScoringPage
description: Creates a page with a scoring form that can be used by judge.
author: StatCan Digital Innovation

DisabledHtml.Html: The Scoring form is currently disabled.

Template.Text:
{% assign scoreEntry = Queries.GetScoreEntry | query: teamContentItemId: Request.Query['teamId'], owner: User.Identity.Name  %}
{% assign judge = Queries.GetVolunteer | query: owner: User.Identity.Name | first %}

<v-container fluid>
  {% if scoreEntry == null %}
  <input type="hidden" name="judge" value="{{ judge.ContentItemId }}">
  <input type="hidden" name="team" value="{{ Request.Query['teamId'] }}">
  <v-card-text>
    <v-row justify="center">
        <v-col cols="8">       
          <v-radio-group name="score" v-model="score" row>
                <v-radio v-for="n in 11" :key="n" :label="`${n - 1}`" :value="`${n - 1}`" />
		  </v-radio-group>        
        </v-col>
        <v-col cols="8">
         	  <v-textarea name="comment" v-model="comment" :error-messages="errors" counter="true" filled="filled" label="{{ "commentLabel" | localize }}" rows="5"/>
        </v-col>
        <v-col cols="8">
          <v-alert type="success" v-if="formSuccessMessage">
            {% raw %}{{ formSuccessMessage }}{% endraw %}
          </v-alert>
          <v-alert type="error" v-if="formErrorMessage">
            {% raw %}{{ formErrorMessage }}{% endraw %}
          </v-alert>
        </v-col>
        <v-col cols="8">
    	  <v-btn type="submit" color="#000" depressed block dark @click="formHandleSubmit" :disabled="formSubmitting">{{ "submitLabel" | localize }}</v-btn>
        </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-card-text>
  {% endif %}
</v-container>

LocalizedItems.Value: Un score ou un commentaire est requis.
A score or comment is required.
